actions.subcommittee: Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: A bill to provide that in civil actions where the United States is a party a prevailing defendant or plaintiff may recover a reasonable attorney's fee and other reasonable litigation costs.

summary.text: Directs the United States to pay to any defendant or plaintiff who prevails in a civil action in which the United States is a party reasonable attorney's fees and other litigation costs.

titles.title: A bill to provide that in civil actions where the United States is a party a prevailing defendant or plaintiff may recover a reasonable attorney's fee and other reasonable litigation costs.
